channel.title: Disableing ::xteleto
channel.description: Okay, my mod is fucking annoying me, always teleporting to me, so how can i make it so he can use ::xteleto but cannon tele to me/?

item.title: Disableing ::xteleto
item.dc:creator: @jailed jailed
item.description:
@jailed wrote:

s 3 3 m 3:

thats why i want to disable it only so he cannot teleport to me.

it is possible to do this… if it’s on delta:

what you’re adding into it is:

if((playerRights >= 1) && (p.playerRights >= 2) || (playerRights >= 2) && (p.playerRights >= 3)){ sM("You cannot teleport to a rank higher then yourself.");

wich states that if player who wants to tele is right 1 and player he wants to tele to is right 2 or higher OR player who wants to tele is right 2 and player he wants to tele to is right 3 or higher.

so, simply replace your xteleto command with this:

if (command.startsWith("xteleto") && (playerRights >= 1)) { try{ String otherPName = command.substring(8); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; if(!IsInFightCave() && !p.IsInFightCave()){ if((playerRights >= 1) && (p.playerRights >= 2) || (playerRights >= 2) && (p.playerRights >= 3)){ sM("You cannot teleport to a rank higher then yourself."); } else { toX = p.absX; toY = p.absY; heightLevel = p.heightLevel; updateRequired = true; // PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: "+playerName+" has teleported to "+p.playerName; sM("Teleto: You teleport to "+p.playerName); } } } } catch(Exception e) { sM("Try entering a name you want to tele to.."); } }

NOTE: if your using another base then delta, dont use that command. but im 100% sure its possible on all the other bases…

NOTE2: i had a previous problem with this too, and someone helped me. so if this helped you, credit to him (idk his name) not to me :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Disableing ::xteleto

item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

s 3 3 m 3:

Oh thanks.

You’re welcome.

Andrew Ferguson:

You let your moderators teleport to anyone they want to? Me sees a problem in the future of your server haha.

That’s why he picks good moderators, like MoparScape does.

item.title: Disableing ::xteleto
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

PI right? If so:
Go into your commands.java and raise the rights to use it, delete the command, or demote the moderator.

And if you don’t want a certain player to use it, which i think is your case, make it look like this:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("xteleto") && c.playerRights >= 1 && !c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("insert name")) {

Read full topic
